content.text: Read the text below. Do you think this person is likely to win the lottery? Discuss it with your classmates.
content.name: YM9U

content.class: bg-slate-100 rounded p-3 my-2 max-w-3xl mx-auto

content.text:
I can imagine what my life would be like if I won the lottery. Wow! I could do so many things, and my life would be so different. I would love the chance to change my life with money. The first thing I would do is change my job and run into a new business. I work in a small company where I don't receive the job benefits that I need to live, and I have always dreamed of having my own business and hiring my employees. With all that money, I could give them benefits such as pension schemes, vacations, paid off time, healthcare assurance, and even a Christmas bonus! I don’t have a car right now, so I would buy a new car and I would give them credits to get new cars to bring at work. Or, I might even buy a new motorcycle. I like motorcycles, and I can imagine myself driving down the highway with the wind in my hair.

Of course, if I won the lottery, I would give some of the money to charity. I would probably give my money to a charity that helps sick children. Also, if any of my friends needed anything, I could help them pay for it. I know many people who have student loans, and I could help them pay the loans back. That would make them very happy. Plus, if I won a lot of money, I would certainly save some of it invested in the bank.

Also, I think that if I won a huge amount of money, I would open a chain business. I love to cook, and I have always wanted to open a restaurant. With all that money I could open a fancy restaurant.

However, I know one thing I would not do is travel. I have a friend who won $100, 000 in the lottery three years ago. She took the money and traveled for three months. I think she is crazy. Traveling is nice, but then she had nothing left after her vacation.

I think, however, that the only problem with dreaming about the money I could win is that I have never even played the lottery before. As they say: “You can’t win if you don’t play.”
